title: GameSpot's Top Ten Games Of 2024
description: GameSpot brings you our staff picks for the best 10 games of 2024. Timestamps: 00:00 Astro Bot 03:30 Balatro 06:15 Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree 08:25 Helldivers 2 10:55 Indiana Jones and The Great Circle 12:50 Lorelei and the Laser Eyes 15:38 Metaphor: ReFantazio 18:01 Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown 20:36 Silent Hill 2 23:23 S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart Of Chornobyl

GameSpot brings you our staff picks for the best 10 games of 2024. Timestamps: 00:00 Astro Bot 03:30 Balatro 06:15 Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree 08:25 Helldivers 2 10:55 Indiana Jones and The Great Circle 12:50 Lorelei and the Laser Eyes 15:38 Metaphor: ReFantazio 18:01 Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown 20:36 Silent Hill 2 23:23 S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart Of Chornobyl

By Kurt Indovina , Richard Li , and Max Blumenthal on December 23, 2024 at 8:00AM PST
